long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension embeds all functionalities you will need to access the ichigo-based decentralized social world.

It provides a Wallet which represents your identity on the ichigo network and will help you encrypt, decrypt sign and verify your transactions. It will also allow you to receive and hold your ICHIGO coin and settle transaction with the ichigo nodes.
